data.title: Taxi No. 9 2 11
data.description: Taxi No. 9 2 11 is a Hindi comedy drama, starring John Abraham, Nana Patekar, Sonali Kulkarni, Sameera Reddy, directed by Milan Luthria. Raghav Shastri, a taxi-driver and Jai Mittal, a businessman have one thing in common, that is they are both hot-tempered. Raghav gives Jai a lift while the latter is on his way to a bank. When Jai nags Raghav for driving too slow, they get into an accident with Jai losing the key to the vault in the taxi. This leads to a series of events which change their lives forever. Watch the full movie, Taxi No. 9 2 11, online only on Hotstar.

data.title: Bhoot Unkle
data.description:
Bhoot Unkle is a comedy in which a young boy persuades the ghost of a bloodthirsty pirate to commit surprisingly good deeds.|

 Shyam (Dev Kantawala) is wrongly accused of theft and runs away to hide in a lighthouse. The lighthouse turns out to be haunted and its ghost takes up the cudgels for the good guys. Bhoot Unkle (Jackie Shroff) and Shyam join hands to defeat the villain and save the town of Haripur from imminent disaster.

data.title: War of the Arrows
data.description: Set in the 1600s, a war breaks out between Manchus and Korea and siblings Nam-yi and Ja-in get separated in the same. 13 years later, Nam-yi, now a skilled archer, rebels against the Mongols to find his missing sister.

data.title: Mirzya
data.description: Mirzya is a Hindi romantic drama written by Gulzar, directed by Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra and starring Harshvardhan Kapoor, Saiyami Kher and Anuj Choudhry. The legend of Mirzya-Sahiban, the star-crossed lovers, lives on when Munish/Adil (Harshvardhan Kapoor), a horse groom, crosses path with his childhood love, Suchitra (Saiyami Kher). But as she is engaged to marry the local prince, what will they do? Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.

data.title: Main Hoon Zakhmi Khiladi
data.description: Munna and Charan are motocross racers and arch enemies. When Munna falls in love with Varalakshmi, little does he know that she is Charan’s sister. Will this love story have a happily ever after?

data.title: Ramaa: The Saviour
data.description: Ramaa: The Saviour is a Hindi action drama starring The Great Khali, Sahil Khan and Tanushree Dutta, directed by Hadi Ali Abrar. While playing a new video game, six children land on an isolated island where they are attacked by Vali, a giant man. Ramaa saves them, but then there's a battle between brothers Vali and Kali. Watch the full movie, Ramaa: The Saviour, online, only on Hotstar.

data.title: Garv: Pride and Honour
data.description: Garv: Pride and Honour is a Hindi drama, starring Salman Khan, Shilpa Shetty and Arbaaz Khan, directed by Puneet Issar. Inspector Arjun is an honest cop who becomes a victim of a corrupt system. He is dismissed from the police force, is arrested for murder and accused of the unthinkable. Watch the full movie, Garv: Pride and Honour, online, only on Hotstar.
data.detail: Mild Sexual references, Mild Language , Moderate Violence

data.title: Samurai Ek Yodha
data.description: Samurai Ek Yodha is a Hindi drama starring Vikram (of Aparichit and I fame) and Anita Hassanandani. It directed by National Award winning director Balaji Sakthivel of Vazhakku Enn 18/9 fame. It is the Hindi dub of the 2002 Tamil superhit, Samurai. Thiyagu decides to take the law into his own hands out of frustration and leads a gang to abduct corrupt politicians. Deiva, a local police officer's daughter, has a crush on him. The police catch him but Deiva's father helps them run away. Watch the full movie online, only on Hotstar.

data.title: Khuda Kasam
data.description:
Neetu Singh (Tabu) is out to clear her name in the murder of the Chief Minister. She takes convict Hussain’s (Sunny Deol) help, who is himself serving a jail sentence for a crime that he has not committed. Watch the full movie, Khuda Kasam online, only on 
Hotstar.

data.title: Khaidi No. 150
data.description: Khaidi No. 150 is a Hindi dubbed film starring Chiranjeevi and Kajal Aggarwal. When Seenu escapes from prison, he sends his lookalike Shankar in his place. But when he realises that Shankar was helping the farmers of his village, he decides to fight for them. Watch the full film, Khaidi No. 150, streaming on Hotstar.

data.title: Sonali Cable
data.description: Sonali, a spunky, self-made internet operator grows her small business into a successful company. But, there's someone who wants Sonali out of business.

data.title: Brave
data.description: A martial artist is blackmailed by a gangster to rob a bank, while his brother is held at ransom.

data.title: Naina
data.description: Naina is a Hindi thriller starring Urmila Matondkar, Anuj Sawhney, directed by Shripal Morakhia. A girl loses her parents and her eyesight in an accident. When she grows up, she is given a corneal implant to restore her vision. But with the new vision she also gets a curse which haunts her. Watch the full movie online, on Hotstar.

data.title: Talvar
data.description: The film is based on the real double murder case of a teenage girl and the family’s domestic help. Things take a complex turn, when multiple conflicting theories about the perpetrators emerge.

data.title: 700 Sharks
data.description: In Polynesia, an international team of scientists reveal the hunting strategies and social behaviors of sharks, the world's greatest predator.

data.title: Nanhe Natkhat Dhoom Dhamal
data.description: Buddy and Molly are living happily with their five pups, Rosebud, Buddha, Budderball, Mudbud, and B-Dawg. Tragedy strikes when their parents are kidnapped, and they need to go on a risky rescue mission.

data.title: World's Worst Weather
data.description: While a storm can captivate you with its beauty, up close, it's power can destroy everything in its path. The documentary highlights the impact of extreme weather phenomena and tales of those who survived them.

data.title: Ishq
data.description: Ishq is a Hindi comedy drama starring Ajay Devgn, Kajol, Juhi Chawla, Aamir Khan, Sadashiv Amrapurkar and alip Tahil. Businessmen Ranjit (Amrapurkar) and Harbanslal (Tahil) want their children Ajay (Devgn) and Madhu (Chawla) to marry each other. However, Madhu falls in love with Raja (Khan), a mechanic while Ajay falls for Kajal (Kajol), a poor girl. The fathers form a nasty plot to create a rift between the couples. Watch the full movie Ishq online, only on Hotstar.

data.title: Hero The Action Man
data.description: Hero The Action Man is a Hindi action movie starring Amala Paul and Naga Chaitanya in the lead roles, and directed by Vivek Krishna. It is the Hindi dub of the Telugu movie Bejawada, and is produced by Ram Gopal Varma. It was also dubbed in Tamil as Vikram Dhadha. Siva Krishna vows to avenge the death of his brother by a local goon, who is an aspiring politician. Watch the full movie online, only on Hotstar.

data.title: Chameli
data.description: On a stormy night, a sudden encounter with Chameli, a prostitute changes the life of a depressed investment banker, forever.

data.title: Maatr
data.description: Vidya is left traumatised after her teenage daughter Tia, is gang-raped and murdered. She sets out to seek revenge by punishing her murderers and fighting the broken justice system.

data.title: Zameen
data.description: Zameen is an action thriller movie starring Ajay Devgan, Abhishek Bachchan and Bipasha Basu in lead roles. It marked the directorial debut of Rohit Shetty (of Golmaal and Chennai Express fame). This thrilling drama is about the army and police, who struggle to work together and rescue hostages in a terrorist hijack. Colonel Ranvir and ACP Jaydev have clashed over methods of dealing with terrorist attacks. Now, they must team up to outwit Pakistani hijackers. Matters are complicated by the fact that Jaydev’s fiancé Nandini is the in-flight supervisor. Watch the full film, streaming online on Hotstar.

data.title: 1971 Beyond Borders
data.description: On a UN Mission, Colonel Mahadevan befriends a Pakistan Commander, who he later discovers has a unique connection with his family. The story moves through flashbacks and narrates the 1971 Indo-Pak war from a soldier’s perspective.

data.title: Guru
data.description: Guru is a dubbed Hindi version of the Marathi film. A con man becomes a witness to a murder, which is a part of a larger conspiracy. It threatens his and his loved ones' lives, and he must fight to overcome all troubles. Directed by Sanjay Jadhav, starring Ankush Choudhary, Urmila Kanitkar and Murli Sharma. Watch the full Hindi film, online only on Hotstar.
data.detail: Mild Sexual references, Moderate Language, Moderate Violence

data.title: Aetbaar
data.description: Aetbaar is a Hindi thriller starring John Abraham, Amitabh Bachchan, Bipasha Basu, directed by Vikram Bhatt. A father tries to protect his daughter from falling in love with an unpredictable and obsessive man, but she will stop at nothing to be with him. Watch the full movie online, on Hotstar.

data.title: Ram Gopal Varma ki Aag
data.description: Dacoit Babban Singh is on the loose in Kaliganj. Inspector Narsimha hires two petty goons, Heero and Raj to nab him. Will the duo succeed in their plan?

data.title: Tum Se Achcha Kaun Hai
data.description: Tum Se Achcha Kaun Hai is a Hindi drama starring Aarti Chhabria, Nakul Kapoor, Kim Sharma, directed by Deepak Anand. Arjun is an aspiring singer. A chance meeting with Naina motivates him to chase his dreams. He is noticed by Bobby, a wealthy young woman, who makes him famous overnight. As Arjun realises that he loves Naina, Bobby becomes obsessed with him. Watch the full movie online, only on Hotstar.

data.title: Wushu
data.description: Wushu is a dubbed Hindi action film directed by Antony Szeto and starring Sammo Hung, Wenjie Wang and Yachao Wang. Five students join a martial arts school and learn the disciplines of Wushu and the bonds of friendship. Ten years later, Today, their bond and their skills are put to the test after they get involved in a child kidnapping ring. Watch Wushu, the full film on Hotstar.

data.title: Bobby Jasoos
data.description:
A woman detective proves her worth in a man’s world.

Bobby Jasoos begins with a mysterious NRI Anees Khan (Kiran Kumar) offering small-time private eye Bobby (Vidya Balan) some cushy work. Bobby’s career blossoms, but there is a fallout. Fetching TV anchor Tasavur (Ali Fazal) is Bobby's romantic interest.

data.title: Style King
data.description: Kartik and Kashi are lookalikes but stark opposites in their profession. Chaos enters their life when they find themselves in a drug racket with different motives.

data.title: London Paris New York
data.description: Nikhil and Lalita's romantic uncertainties take them romping across continents - from London, to Paris to New York. Will they find their happily ever after?

data.title: My Friend Ganesha 2
data.description:
The god Ganesha befriends a small boy and comes to his aid. 

A lonely boy, Aashu (Master Ali), looks for companionship and finds it in Lord Ganesha, the lovable and softhearted elephant-headed god. Ganesha gets Ashu out of trouble and they enjoy a good time together. The film also stars Bhairavi Goswami, Harsh Chhaya, Suhasini Muley and Sulabha Deshpande.
data.detail: Mild Sexual content, Some scenes of intimacy, Mild Language, some frightening scenes

data.title: Bhaag Johnny
data.description:
Bhaag Johnny is a Bollywood action film, directed by Shivam Nair and starring Kunal Khemu, Zoa Morani, Manasi Scott and Mukul Dev.

The film is a thriller about the choices you make, the consequences of which may not be what you bargained for. Watch the full Bhaag Johnny movie online, streaming on hotstar.
data.detail: Mild Sexual references, Strong Language , Moderate Violence, Drug references

data.title: Ekk Deewana Tha
data.description: In this remake of Tamil blockbuster, Vinnaithaandi Varuvaayaa, Sachin falls in love with Jessie, who is from a different community. The parents' disapprove and the two separate. Will they realise that they are meant to be together?

data.title: Khauff
data.description: Neha, an only witness to a Police officer’s murder is assigned a bodyguard, Babu. As time passes by, Neha falls in love with Babu, only to realize his true intentions.

data.title: Little Krishna III - The Wondrous Feats
data.description: Little Krishna III - The Wondrous Feats is a Hindi animated film, which shows Lord Krishna fighting dangerous demons in the shape of poisonous Aghasura, dreadful Vatsasura, and wicked Vyomasura. Watch the full film, streaming on Hotstar.

data.title: Rann
data.description: Rann is a Hindi thriller starring Amitabh Bachchan, Ritesh Deshmukh, Sudeep, Paresh Rawal, directed by Ram Gopal Varma. Vijay is the CEO of a struggling news channel. His son Jai manages to convince him into airing a fabricated news report. But after reporter Purab exposes Jai, will Vijay bow down to the demands of his business? Watch the full movie online, only on Hotstar.
